meanings.definition: To bring or transport (goods or items) to a destination.
meanings.sent1: The mail carrier delivered the package to our doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The pizza delivery person delivered our dinner right on time.
meanings.sent3: The stork delivered a baby to the happy family.
meanings.sent4: Her speech delivered a powerful message to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The truck delivered a load of fresh vegetables to the market.

meanings.sent1: The doctor delivered the baby safely into the mother's arms.
meanings.sent2: The expecting mother delivered a healthy baby boy.
meanings.sent3: The baby delivered a loud cry as soon as he was born.
meanings.sent4: The hospital room delivered a sense of calm during the delivery.
meanings.sent5: The midwife delivered the baby with great care and expertise.

meanings.definition: To hand over or transfer (something) to someone.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer delivered the legal documents to the client.
meanings.sent2: The courier delivered the important package to the office.
meanings.sent3: The magician delivered the playing card to the amazed audience member.
meanings.sent4: The teacher delivered the graded papers to the students.
meanings.sent5: The waiter delivered the check to the table after the meal.
